definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
Confucian moral injunctions of fidelity/piety to one's parents, respect to one's older brother, loyalty to one's monarch, faith to one's male friends

sentences.english: Be thou faithful until death: and I will give thee the crown of life.
sentences.chinese: 你應當忠信至死，我必要賜給你生命的華冠。

sentences.english: For they are a generation of perversions, Children in whom is no faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 他們本是乖謬的一代，心裏無忠信的兒女。

sentences.english: A person firmly committed to faith in God does not bow to tempting or compromising situations.
sentences.chinese: 堅定忠信於神的人不向誘人或妥協的景況低頭。

sentences.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life.
sentences.chinese: 你務要至死忠信，我就賜給你那生命的冠冕。

sentences.english: Dear faithful brothers and sisters, we salute you –from an old brother who is almost ashamed of living in freedom.
sentences.chinese: 忠信的兄弟姊妹們，我們向你們致敬。

sentences.english: Many proclaim themselves loyal, but who can find one worthy of trust?
sentences.chinese: 人多述說自己的仁慈，但忠信人誰能遇着呢？

sentences.english: Be loyalty to faith, thee will get the whole world, or thee will lose everything.
sentences.chinese: 是故君子有大道，必忠信以得之，驕泰以失之。

sentences.english: But God is faithful, who will strengthen and keep you from evil.
sentences.chinese: 主是忠信的，他必堅固你們，保護你們免於兇惡。

sentences.english: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.
sentences.chinese: 我揀選了忠信的道，將你的典章擺在我面前。

definition: Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

Xinyi or Hsinyi district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Xinyi or Hsini district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Xinyi or Hsini township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to do one's duty as a younger brother
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
numerous/common people (or populace)/born of a concubine
